q1: When did France win their 1st World Cup?
q2: How many World Cups has France won?
a2: France have won two World Cups. The first in 1998 and the second in 2018.
q3: Have they ever won the European championships?
a3: Yes, they have won that twice, once in 1984, and again in 2000.
q4: Do you think they will win one soon?
a4: Yes, I believe they have a high chance of winning
